website_summaries.verdict: Not a heavy-duty tool kit, but provides most common tools you need around the home.
pros: Good set of tools offered at a very reasonable price
Works great for an inexpensive gift, especially for first-time homeowners
Pink color makes them stand out, so you'll always keep the set organized
cons: Not really made for tough repair work
Tools may pop out of place as you move tool box

customer_reviews.title: Save yours or someone else’s marriage. BUY THESE TOOLS!
customer_reviews.text: Great variety of needful, useful household tools. They seem to be of good quality. My nephew and his wife bought a house and are doing some minor renovations so I gave this to her for Christmas. She was THRILLED! I only wish I would have found something like this earlier in my marriage to keep from having disputes. Most men won’t touch them because they are “pink girly tools” This is a GREAT gift for any woman who likes doing projects herself!
customer_reviews.author: TexHygienist

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little tool kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for use with my small business. I don’t need name brand tools. The tools I use just need to get the job done. I love the case too! It keeps everything in its place. The only thing I noticed that I will be fixing are the black end caps on the individual screw drivers. The black rubber pieces don’t stay on, but super glue will fix that! Fantastic kit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Nehlen

customer_reviews.title: It's in a very good, durable zippered "pouch"
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife (for upcoming Christmas actually...LOL). It's in a very good, durable zippered "pouch". The tools were all in their place (except for a couple of the knife blades that came out of their container...not a biggie). Good variety of all tools, and decent quality too. No, not made for heavy duty work perhaps, but good for around-the-house things my wife enjoys doing. It's definitely a "girly" looking set. I'd even use them if I needed to. Now, she can have her own special set to keep in a drawer in the kitchen. Good set...good price.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Great so far.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter to take to her dorm room. On day one we fixed the desk and the light that was supposed to be attached to it (but was hanging down instead). Great so far. The shape of the screwdriver handle makes it very easy to use, and it has a lot of attachments. The rest are also solid, real tools, not flimsy imitations. So far we're very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for daughter's dorm.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter, who was moving into her dorm for the first day. I had to put together some new dorm furniture during the move in. I used the hammer and screwdrivers during the process. Both were sturdy and did the job. She really liked the color and how the tools stored. This kit should cover her for any small projects that may come up.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: WORKPRO W009012A Pink Lady Tool Set - Beware of loose razors
customer_reviews.text: I think this item was previously used due to finding loose objects including razor blades out of their container and bits holders not in their holders. The razor blades had slid under other tools but fortunately could be seen to no damage done to fingers. The set is for women but the hammer is heavier than the hammer my son uses and both are the same size. Overall I'm not impressed and not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Denise C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Set!
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of always hunting down hubby's tools in the garage, so this is perfect for my needs and it stays in the laundry room where I can readily retrieve it. I love the pieces in it, perfect for small jobs that I'll use it for. Have used some of the pieces already, and so far seems real sturdy! Great value for all you get! Would make a great wedding shower or house warming gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ladeeabigail

customer_reviews.title: Bought this set for my girlfriend (and myself but don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my girlfriend (and myself but don't tell anyone) her old set was missing most of the tools. I would have to say this set is more involved than her last set has just about everything you need to fix this and that around the house
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kittell

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tool set
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent set of tools. This set has all the basics plus a few nice extras. So far the tools are of very good quality and have stood up to a lot of use assembling furniture and completing projects. I can't really comment on the carrying bag because I transferred the tools to a metal toolbox, but it appeared to be pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine F.

customer_reviews.title: Great little set of sturdy tools.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter requested a pink tool set for her birthday. This set of tools is compact, organized, and sturdy. The tools will hold up well for her purposes, and there's no mistaking her tools from her brothers' tools. Everything you need for basic fix-it's is in here.
customer_reviews.author: hoamer

customer_reviews.title: Not a little girl's tool set! Just get it.
customer_reviews.text: This set SCREAMS feminine, which was a red flag to me at first (ever heard of the pink tax?), HOWEVER, WorkPro is a reliable brand that can be found in your favorite local hardware stores, so the allure of a girly set is not a substitute for quality in this case. I bought this before my recent pink obsession began. I do a lot of DIY stuff at home and recently had to build an IKEA bookcase, so this certainly came in handy! As a single person who lives alone, I never realized how often I would need this stuff. The drill set is well worth the money as well.
customer_reviews.author: Aspen

customer_reviews.title: Would have been a 5 but....
customer_reviews.text: Love having everything in one place and having 4 men in my family, had to get pink so the won’t touch it. My only complaint is the handle that holds the screwdriver bits is not magnetic so the tips don’t stay in very well. That is my only complaint. Oh and one of the straps holding the hammer in is torn.
customer_reviews.author: Just a mom

customer_reviews.title: Solid tools
customer_reviews.text: These are solid tools. I have used a few already and I have only had the set for less than a month. As many other reviewers have said, the hammer's velcro came broken on one end. Design flaw and should put additional velcro to keep in place. I will have to figure out what I can do to keep in place. Some of the tools had a little oily residue on the steel part of the tool. Easy to wipe off. Neither of these issues deserved a deduction of a star in my opinion. Great tools and happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JBell

customer_reviews.title: Nice but the hammer is too large.
customer_reviews.text: The tools here seem fine for the most part, but the hammer is much bigger than I had hoped for. It was so heavy that the Velcro that holds it in place was torn away when it arrived and it makes the whole case heavier than it needs to be. I haven't used this much yet, but we'll see how the tools actually hold up. There is a nice assortment of tools in this case though.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Bud

customer_reviews.title: Practical and oh so pink!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter when she got her first apartment. We put together furniture and put up artwork with this set. So far I have used the screwdriver, pliers and the mini screwdrivers. I do wish the screwdriver bits were a little bit longer and sat deeper in the handle. They are a magnetic but do dislodge more easily than I would like. But it works and the pink is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: practical gal

customer_reviews.title: Quality tools for our princess!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality and attention to detail, a very well layed out tool assortment. Our six years old goes to the Home Depot workshops every month and the other girls really like her tool kit.
customer_reviews.author: michael Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch All the Way!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, nicely made tools and bag. Not a flimsy, girly, set at all! Very pleased. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri D

customer_reviews.title: Great Solid Set of Tools, Easy to Store
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid set in convenient packaging. Made a great gift for our daughters who are in college and, from time to time, need a versatile tool kit that is easily storable and high-quality. we took it to have it monogrammed prior to presentation. Note, the photo I provided is of the monogrammed gift. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love these tools and tool kit. I’m in my late 40’s and have moved so many times... with that, I’ve misplaced hammers, screwdriver bits and etc. I bought this because it had all of the items that I needed and then some more. I’ve used it a few times and love that everything is neatly in a great package. Easily to find, neatly tucked away and now, I can always find the hammer when I need it!
customer_reviews.author: Justagirlinnyc

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift that Gets Used!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my wife that I found online after the one she asked for at Lowe’s sold out. It had more than that one for only slightly more. Good variety, all the basic essentials, decent quality and great case for storage with a set place for each tool. (She hates looking for tools in my tool box.). She lives it and has used it!
customer_reviews.author: David from Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for proving me wrong
customer_reviews.text: I once saw this on a lightning deal and showed a friend saying "like they're gonna sell any of these". To my surprise, he said he had a niece that would love um'. Since they weren't much of Amazon users yet, I bought for them and now I get compliments on the product on a regular basis. Thanks for proving me wrong
customer_reviews.author: Daryl S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this took kit based on the reviews. I needed something compact and cute for my small projects around the house and in my shop. I am an event planner and I make a lot of floral arrangements so having quick and close by is what I was looking for. The tools are a lot bigger than in the pic but that was ok with me. My husband also thinks they are cute. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Fierce

customer_reviews.title: Love this tool kit!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tool kit. Mainly because it fashioned for a woman's smaller hands AND it is pink!! That should keep the guys from swiping my tools. Have lost two complete tool kits to the guys. Bet none of them want to be seen using pink tools. Used this lovely took kit to assemble my new kitchen ladder. Tools for my hands perfectly. Also purchased the ladies pink drill/driver combination.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: She loves 'em!!
customer_reviews.text: got the set for my granddaughter, (I know it can be perceived as sexist but the "princess" is into pink for now.) I took out a few of the items I felt shouldn't be in the hands of a 4 yr old- box cutter and the very small screwdrivers. She loves the kit, and we've started taking apart a bicycle !!
customer_reviews.author: Joe K.

customer_reviews.title: Actually quality tools
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as sort of a tongue-in-cheek gift for my wife (who runs an antique shop with two other ladies) in order to spare my shop tools from misuse or disappearing. We were surprised at the quality and utility of the tool package. Nice tools for everyday use/misuse.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W. Carter

customer_reviews.title: WORKPRO 103-Piece Pink Tool Kit
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made ... I returned it. I'm going to stick to Craftsman tools!
customer_reviews.author: LINDA MICHAUD-HILL

customer_reviews.title: For lightweight chores
customer_reviews.text: The zip bag is not very functional, everything moves around and falls out. Tools are not heavy duty but work well for minor around the house repairs or picture hanging. The screwdriver is not ratcheting, that would have made the set much nicer. Includes most everything to a job done.
customer_reviews.author: Martha S

customer_reviews.title: Good kit for light use around the house
customer_reviews.text: This is cool. We have a far sturdier tool kit, but it's too heavy for my aging back to lift. This serves my purposes quite well. Mostly I use the box cutter for opening Amazon packages, the pliers, and the needle-nosed pliers. And I have to admit I like the pink. Defines it as mine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE MONEY ON THIS
customer_reviews.text: I rated this 5 stars so this can be as the top of the list but if I could rate it1 star I would! This was a cheap tool kit not to mention it was really dirty! I was excited to receive it after reading reviews but when I opened it up I could tell it was used because it was dirty, things were falling off and I didn’t even use it yet. Also there was sticky substance on one of the tools and it looked liked honey!! Don’t waste you’re money!!
customer_reviews.author: Eldarah Sierra Brown Tom

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: The pink wasn’t necessary but the tools are great. Love the variety. I ordered two one for my kitchen and one for my Rv. These get most jobs done in an easy to use and carry package. Light weight but the tools are normal sizes. Just what I needed. No digging thru my husbands dirty tool boxes for the tool I need. These stay handy and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Larry G. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: looks like a great little tool set
customer_reviews.text: this is an xmas gift for my daughter so I can't really recommend it yet, but I think she will love it. The tools are of decent quality and the set includes lots of stuff. She is forever looking for "tools" around her house so I assume this will be a wonderful surprise for her. Oh, and the case is nice, feminine and looks durable. Glad I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Well made tools
customer_reviews.text: Finally tools that will stay in the house and not migrate to the shop. Very pleased with these, they have good weight to them and just what I needed for little projects around the house that doesn’t require my asking my husband for help with. I got tired of running out to the shop to get a hammer, or screwdriver, since this is a lovely shade of pink, they have not left the house.
customer_reviews.author: NAnk67

customer_reviews.title: Good tool set.
customer_reviews.text: Good assortment of quality tools for my wife so she won't keep borrowing mine. The Velcro strap for the hammer broke, but no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: old Crow

customer_reviews.title: My 20 year old daughter loves this toolkit for women
customer_reviews.text: My 20 year old daughter moved out on her own a few months ago. She kept needing to borrow my hammer, a screwdriver, level and so on. When I saw this pink toolbox for women I had to get it for her. She loved it and I got my tools back. I call that a win win.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality worthy of a purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for myself and was super impressed with the quality of the tools! I would definitely purchase this as a gift for someone else as it is so adorably encased in a carry case that easily stores away in the closet on a shelf with all its components intact! Really happy with this purchase and will be using it a lot for odd jobs around my home! 😍
customer_reviews.author: Ren Esi

customer_reviews.title: Retaining straps are tearing away from the inside of the pouch.
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro retaining straps are coming off the inside of the pouch and tools are loose inside instead of organized like they should be. Not even 2 months old and it's time to throw the pouch away.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G.

customer_reviews.title: Good basic kit from a good brand
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of comparison shopping before settling on this kit. Gave it to my single daughter whose ex took all the tools with him when he departed. Had the good basics in it and was a good brand so her dad recommended it over others that were similar. She is getting a lot of good use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: More than basic tool set
customer_reviews.text: I used to tools for home projects and it was useful—never knew there were so many different types of screw driver bits.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Duldulao Conde

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tool set
customer_reviews.text: Great tools set. The items attach with Velcro, so they stay in place better than tool sets I’ve bought before. Would be better if it had different screwdrivers rather than magnetic bits. They would be stronger and last longer. Over all great tool set. I’d buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Blue Fish

customer_reviews.title: Nice toolkit!
customer_reviews.text: It has what I need for around the house and have already used it several times. Love the box cutting knife it has a cool spring-loaded design that gets rid of the annoying screws and awkward release mechanisms on other such knives. Love the whole set!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Von Jaeger

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful deal !! Sturdy tools
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little kit to have I’ve used everything in it and it’s very sturdy I was surprised bc the price was so good I assumed they’d be cheapie tools for around the house at best but I’ve taken it to work doing demo and drywall and other ppl on the crew have even used them!
customer_reviews.author: Keith&Kelly Richards

customer_reviews.title: Extremely defective
customer_reviews.text: Opened up the case and many of the tool straps are broken... Very surprised at the quality. Tools look okay, but case is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Rick McArthur

customer_reviews.title: A must have. Great gift for gals!
customer_reviews.text: Love! So practical and so adorable. All the basics and then some. Sturdy and solid everyday tools. Soft case w all the tools is still so light weight. Use them all the time. Husband rolled his eyes... now HE uses them all the time. All 6’3” of him. So funny. His tool box is so heavy and filled with too much excess!
customer_reviews.author: Second City

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set
customer_reviews.text: Got this one for the lady of the house. She loved it. I have actually ended up using it quite a bit and while the selection is missing some key items (hex/allens, etc) it accomplishes 90% of every day in-home projects. Solid set, nice case to hold it all in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Great kit with all the basics.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife as she wanted a nice kit that had everything handy. She loves it! And it has all the tools you are likely to need.
customer_reviews.author: John O AZ

customer_reviews.title: Tools work great!
customer_reviews.text: This was for girlfriend who got a new apartment and always borrowed my tool. Now she has her own and they are the perfect set for her, and the pink made it fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Dodgen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Convenient kit for day to day use in home. My husband never puts anything back in his toolbox so I wanted something of my own so I could find what I needed when I needed it. Would have preferred a purple kit though!
customer_reviews.author: BethL

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my friend for Christmas, and she loves it! She loves having a separate tool set from her husband, and she can always tell what is hers! Sturdy enough for around-the-house projects, and fits great in the carrying bag. Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: P. Steele

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the wife!
customer_reviews.text: This tool set has just about all that's needed for the "honey I can do it myself" list. The tools seem to be decent quality, only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: DERREK DAHL

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It has everything I need and it's just right. The weight of the tools are great and I've used the crap out of the knife and it's still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi F.

customer_reviews.title: ... a retirement community and it appears to be of good quality. I wouldn't try to rebuild a house ...
customer_reviews.text: It was for my mother in law who live in a retirement community and it appears to be of good quality. I wouldn't try to rebuild a house with it, but for lite work it should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything needed included
customer_reviews.text: Very nice that I can find my tools at any time while my husband searches random spots for his. Loved this set so much that I bought it for my friend as well. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Megan B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Starter Toolset
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that I could have my own toolset separate from my husband's. This set has just about every tool needed for a project. So much so, that I find my husband using this set more than his own. The tools are not cheaply made and they work really well.
customer_reviews.author: CSC

customer_reviews.title: Tools don’t stay in Velcro
customer_reviews.text: Product is as advertised but when I got it, all the tools on the left hand side had come out of their Velcro. I had to refer back to the picture on amazon to figure out where everything went. This may become a nuisance over time and a real “toolbox” may be a better option.
customer_reviews.author: Amy E. Wente

customer_reviews.title: Practical
customer_reviews.text: I love that it comes in Pink. Being the only girl in my department I thought Id bring some color into the office. The tools work great, however the box cutter broke in two after only a few uses. Other than that great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rob&Jenn

customer_reviews.title: I love my pink tools... ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with my pink tool bag... when attending projects, everyone comment about it... The tools are ok though, some of them are not the best quality, but overall I give it 5 stars 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Miri Hatouel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tool set
customer_reviews.text: Perfect first tool set! I love the tape measure, box cutter, and screw drivers most! There’s so many tips for the screw driver as well as a set of mini screw drivers! Everything you’d need in a nice case that has a place for everything!! (In the photo I took the tape measure out to use)
customer_reviews.author: Krystyna Rohde

customer_reviews.title: Great quality tools!
customer_reviews.text: The tools are great quality! The bag is nice for taking your tools places and the razor blade is easy to open to change blades out! I would be this again just for the razor blade, tape measure and hammer! LOVE MY TOOLS!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Segura

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is one purchase I would treasure. Toolkit has almost everything that you may need for any quick handiwork. Good grip and perfect condition. Mine arrived right on time. Only downside I would say is the Color. Although in reality, it looks better than the picture, I still would have liked if I had options. But on a bright side, this will most definitely reduce the chances of any man stealing any of the tools "accidentally" . So, I am good. :)
customer_reviews.author: Uma Ramamoorthi

customer_reviews.title: Impressive set
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this set. Heavy duty tools, much nicer than some of my own.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: The blade was open so just be careful:)
customer_reviews.text: The blade on the box cutter was open and ripped right through the holder, we all laughed mostly because we were shocked I didn’t cut my finger. Other than that great kit!!
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the ladies!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! Perfect for single ladies who do their own repairs! Great quality, great color, great multi tool selection in one cute case. Everything you could possibly need in a toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Every busy mom/women needs one!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received from my husband for Christmas because I complain about never being able to find his tools! I keep it under my laundry sink for easy access! Has everything I could ever need for diy projects around the house! Every busy mom must have one!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Uhrig

customer_reviews.title: Cute kit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for a new woman's house warming! My daughter wanted one so she could identify her tool when her husband and son borrowed them. Seems to be a quite complete set in a nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality and great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter. LOVE the full size items included and the bag is perfect. Reviews seemed harsh as I found the entire product perfectly packed and the value here is exceptional. Absolutely thrilled with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SDownie

customer_reviews.title: This lady loves these tools!
customer_reviews.text: For any small project around the home? This is your go-to tool kit. From a sturdy hammer to plenty of zip ties, WORKPRO has you covered! A solid investment that pays off almost daily for me. And I love the pink!
customer_reviews.author: gwclark

customer_reviews.title: Real tools - only pink
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a young lady just moving to her first house. She loved it and we used it when I visited to put furniture together and hand things on the wall. Regular tools in pink. Everything is full size and quality.
customer_reviews.author: julieD

customer_reviews.title: No major complaints.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality full size tools. The only complaint I have is the tools were not in their proper place when I opened it. Honestly, it wasn’t a big deal I just put them back where they belonged
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Crane

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: One of the straps holding the hammer was ripped on opening package - I plan to put the tools in a box anyway. Tools themselves are nice, good grips and have all worked well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Cron

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my daughters for Christmas gifts and they absolutely love them. California apartment/condo living requires a basic kit like these. They use them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Juan R.

customer_reviews.title: Ladies tool set
customer_reviews.text: Lovely ladies tool set, has everything you might need for the home.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Kubicek

customer_reviews.title: Nice to keep inside
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my SIL. Was told that even though a girly gift...is totally useful and sturdy for a man's man but it doesn't need to "live" in the garage!
customer_reviews.author: LeeLee W

customer_reviews.title: I highly do not recommend this tool set!
customer_reviews.text: The tool bag came with several straps torn off. The ends of the acrew drivers had rubber stoppers that were laying thru out the case that look so cheap. I had to push them back on and this made them look even more cheap. The worst part was I buying this to give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: I love it and can’t wait to try it out on ...
customer_reviews.text: It is really pink! I love it and can’t wait to try it out on different projects....it’s perfect for the woman of the house and since most men would not be caught dead with pink things...I’m sure it will only be used by me!
customer_reviews.author: ladyloihle

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These are good tools, the only problem I have is the end of the screw drivers. The little piece at the end always turns or pops off when using them and that's annoying
customer_reviews.author: Hlove

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter present
customer_reviews.text: She just bought her first home. Loves the tools. Very sturdy, durable and case makes it easy to keep together. She also likes the color.
customer_reviews.author: Connie E. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Handy set to have!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to go with the WORKPRO pink and black cordless drill. This is a nice set. Well packaged and very easy to take along when needed.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I love the convenience of the case and pink to help separate my tools from my husband. Kit has everything I need. My daily go to.
customer_reviews.author: Delaine

customer_reviews.title: Good price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tool set for my daughter’s for Christmas. It comes with a nice case that keeps everything organized. It is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: J.D. Braddy

customer_reviews.title: I love this kit everyone in my house seems to take ...
customer_reviews.text: All the tools that I need to work with. I love this kit everyone in my house seems to take tools and lose them this way I have my own personal tools and I keep them in my own bag plus they’re pink! Kara
customer_reviews.author: Kara R. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Love my girlie tool set
customer_reviews.text: Love my girlie tool set!!!!! Husband doesn't keep his tools organized and I could never find tools when I needed them. My girlie tools are off limits. Now I can find the tools I need when I want them
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Descent first set
customer_reviews.text: Great little set, not extremely durrable after a few uses the screwdriver bits wear
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tools for those to-do’s at home.
customer_reviews.text: This set was a gift for a friend who loves to be organized and neat. This is perfect for her household chores when tools are needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Wish the case was a tad sturdier but its a great set❤️( the straps holding the hammer in place was broken in mine seeing as the hammer is so heavy the straps weren’t strong enough, everything else is fantastic)
customer_reviews.author: anais

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a girls first apartment.
customer_reviews.text: Person I bought it for loved it. She just moved into an apartment just off campus.
customer_reviews.author: Forest Sickles

customer_reviews.title: If it weren’t too late, I would return this.  If it had cost a lot l,
customer_reviews.text: Probably would not purchase this again. Too many itemsin bag that I wouldn’t ever use, and don’t even know what thy are for. The hammer is toooo heavy!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good household tool set. Most everything you could need on a day to day basis. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Connie S.

customer_reviews.title: Super girly but functional!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It‘s super girly but functional. U‘ve got a wide variety of quality handy tools. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of this tool kit
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this tool kit. I have used it many times already. With the pink color, I don't think my tools will disappear into the garage with the men's tools.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Maze

customer_reviews.title: Pretty in Pink
customer_reviews.text: Other than the "pink tax" this was a great purchase. It was a gift for my mom and she uses it frequently. There's not much room to add additional tools but she wanted to make sure it was small and that my dad wouldn't steal her tools anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Katie C.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for first time apartment dwellers.
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my granddaughter and her roommates when they moved into their first apartment. She loves it and has thanked me many times.
customer_reviews.author: kathe dabbs

customer_reviews.title: Actual tools. not cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when I looked at these that they were "fake" girl tools.. Plastic and poorly made... but nope. Love this set!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Use it all the time, I keep it handy for small projects around the house. I thought buying pink tools would keep my (Mechanic) bf from using them but I even caught him using them too 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not Top Line tools, but they work.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift. She loved it. Not the greatest set of tools or case but they work and they look nice.
customer_reviews.author: W. Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Great tool set.
customer_reviews.text: Cute and feminine, but also high quality. I use these tools regularly, and I have had no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: K. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Hit the Mark
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift, and for the price, it hit the mark. The young recipient was thrilled when she opened it and quickly went off to use the Tool set.
customer_reviews.author: JonB

customer_reviews.title: Nice birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for a young lady just moving out on her own. She was happy to get it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sprau

customer_reviews.title: Love this toolkit!
customer_reviews.text: Love my tool kit. I’ve been able to put together all my amazon purchases while being in quarantine. They are durable, easy to use and the bag is perfect to keep everything organized.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy little kit.
customer_reviews.text: A good basic tool kit for in the house. The wife loved it. The tools are of decent quality and the case is well made.
customer_reviews.author: james fulton

customer_reviews.title: The product was sent to me in used condition.
customer_reviews.text: This product was sent to me in used condition, there was a petroleum like substance on the box cutter. Amazon was very fast about sending me a new set. Even though the strap that holds the hammer was broken, I kept the product bc I needed to use the tools that night. The tools did there job so no complaints on the craftsman ship.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: WORKPRO 103-Piece Pink Tool Kit - Ladies Hand Tool Set with Easy Carrying Round Pouch - Durable, Long Lasting Chrome Finish Tools - Perfect for DIY, Home Maintenance
feature_bullets: ANTI-CORROSIVE CHROME FINISH - All the tools are made with drop forged CR-v steel coated with a chrome plated finish which protects against corrosion. No need to worry about leaving your tools outdoors as our tools are rust-resistant

103 - PIECE PINK TOOL SET- This tool set comes with all the most useful and necessary tools for home maintenance and daily use. It includes a hammer, level, pliers, magnetic screwdrivers and bits, wrenches, cable ties,utility knife and much more

IDEAL FOR HOUSEHOLD MAINTENANCE - Our tool kit is perfect for DIY or home repair and maintenance. It has all the equipment and tools needed and comes with an easy to carry round pouch that allows for simple storage and added flexibility

HIGHLY DURABLE AND SAFE TO USE - All the tools meet or exceed the ANSI (American National Standards Institute) specifications for added safety. No need to worry about your tools getting damaged or breaking while in use

GREAT GIFTS FOR WOMEN GIRLS - These tools come with a soft grip handle that makes them more comfortable and secure than others. Perfect present for Christmas, Birthday, Anniversary, Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, etc

specifications.Included Components: Tape measure^hammer^magnetic screwdriver holder^precision screwdriver^pliers^knife^adjustable wrench^level^bits^cable tie
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,104 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
